title: Spiritual Masters - Novel Updates
tags: Cold Protagonist   College/University   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Revenge   Spirits
author: Man Man He Qi Duo   漫漫何其多
description:
“This this the eleventh year of me trying to find you” — Chi Zheng

Spiritual powers in an urban world.

A couple reuniting after a long separation.

Qian Tu: couldn’t handle his bad fate and lost all his memory (shou)

Chi Zheng: clingy as ever even in the afterlife (gong)>
